website_summaries.verdict: In your choice of many finishes, these handcrafted iron shelves split the difference between function and style.
pros: Can hold shelves that are 8 inches or 10 inches deep
Heavy-duty, as long as you mount them for heavy-duty use
cons: Do not over-torque the screw, or it may break
Consider using different screws to mount, especially if you need to reach the stud for heavy-duty use

customer_reviews.title: Will require some work
customer_reviews.text: These brackets lend an impressive industrial look to your project. They feel sturdy and are quite heavy. However, these required a considerable amount of work for my project. First off, the upper mounting points are laterally offset whereas the lower mounting point is central. This can make it hard to mount the bracket into a narrow stud. The screws included are comically undersized. They will not reach any stud, so you will need to purchase your own hardware. The eye holes in the bracket are far too small. I had to dremel them out to fit my larger, better screws in the hole. Overall the brackets are impressive, if a bit large (as a caution), but were difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: They are very well made and sturdy. My only complaint is the chintzy flat head ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 16 of these brackets to compliment some Walnut shelves I built for my home office. They are very well made and sturdy. My only complaint is the chintzy flat head screws they include. Who even uses flat heads anymore? They are way too small to be used to mount the brackets to the walls, and too frustrating to use for attaching the shelves to the brackets. Bring your own screws and these are a fantastic choice.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Dann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and attractive. We used these to hang some very beefy shelves though, so I had to use bigger screws than the ones provided to go into the wall studs. Not a problem, just be aware the screws provided are on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: home.sweet.historic.home

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful brackets that are simple, yet they make a statement. Needed them for a bar I am building. They held the weight (combined with a 2x4 half wall) of an 18"×10'-5" maple slab. There are 6 points of fastening. (3) in the top flange and (3) on the back. The black screws that come with the brackets are not very heavy duty. Less than 1" long and not for large scale projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  accent for rustic shelving
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing these, I found them in a fancy design magazine for way more $$$. They were for a customer and they loved they look of the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with a classic look
customer_reviews.text: I installed 8 of these brackets for shelves in my future child's bedroom with the help of a laser level (HIGHLY RECOMMEND). They are sturdy and good looking. I only wish that the screw included to go through the shelf was 1mm shorter. I couldn't tighten the screw all the way because the end poked through the shelf. I used a simple 1x12 board for the shelf and the screws were technically too long. You can't tell that the screws could use one more 1/2 turn to be fully tightened, and the integrity of the bracket doesn't seem to be compromised. I highly recommend these brackets.
customer_reviews.author: VWA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Angle Brackets
customer_reviews.text: I live up north in the freezing tundra of Minnesota and the plow trucks hit my mailbox and broke the cast iron bracket that held my mailbox on the post. The ground is frozen so I couldn't dig a new mailbox in so I used this bracket with toggle bolts and mounted it to the riser and mailbox and it is solidly mounted. It was buried in deep wet snow from plows two days after mounting it and it survived my neighbor used the second one in my kit to fix his mailbox as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rites

customer_reviews.title: These make me way happier than just brackets ought to
customer_reviews.text: These are the most beautiful yet heavy duty brackets. The design is simple and elegant, attributes that aren't easily combined with something so strong. I hesitated because of the price (which for 2 really isn't bad, but $43 for brackets took me some time to allow myself.) I am so happy with them I looked for more places I could use them and found use for 4 more. Really great product and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara hort geek

customer_reviews.title: We used these to mount 2in thick alder wood shelves ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these to mount 2in thick alder wood shelves in our kitchen. The shelves are 12in deep and loaded with dishes. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: trs80

customer_reviews.title: Shabby chic Isupports
customer_reviews.text: These brackets are just as described and sturdy. Because the screws provided are only long enough to screw directly into wood, I deducted a star. I used longer screws, as I mounted on drywall (over studs) and the provided screws are too short. Inserted screws at a slight inward angle to be sure I hit the stud. Mounted the brackets under the front overhang of my breakfast bar - unobtrusive and I don't hit my knees on them when sitting at the breakfast bar.
customer_reviews.author: Texan felinophile

customer_reviews.title: Simple, rustic, and classic brackets
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed for some home shelving projects. The aesthetic is pretty versatile and streamline, and they work in multiple rooms in our home that all have different styles. I’m looking forward to using them in more rooms throughout the house. If you’re not mounting them on studs, be sure to use wall expanders (I’m sure the negative reviews have come from people who put them directly into drywall).
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Colella

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy. used these to hold up a granite kitchen counter overhang
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. used these to hold up a granite kitchen counter overhang last year and they have been great! The color fits the white kitchen perfectly and they look great. Very happy with this purchase! I actually needed one more after they were sold out. I contacted the seller and they sent me one single bracket direct from their manufacturer for no charge. PHENOMENAL customer service.
customer_reviews.author: geoff nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets.
customer_reviews.text: IMO, These brackets are better looking and of much higher quality than most other hardware of it's kind. You need to use different screws than the ones that are provided, but that is fairly normal. My only suggestion would be to provide longer stronger screws and bore the holes out a bit wider to work with the heavier duty screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mcberry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these brackets!
customer_reviews.text: The brackets look and work great! No issues with the black finish. Each bracket was shipped in an individual plastic bag with two per box. Love that the brackets have screw holes that kinda loop out, which makes for easier install. And the price was the best I could find! They are very sturdy. They hold all of my glass dishes. We didn't use the screws. They were too short. They are a 7 and we couldn't find an exact match so we used a size 6 x 2 black drywall screw as we had to drill through tile, backer board and plywood. They worked just fine. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rollins

customer_reviews.title: "I like these. I would buy more of these."
customer_reviews.text: That was exactly what my husband said after opening these and looking them over. They are heavy-duty, look nice, and were easy to install. I appreciate that they're stylish without unnecessary embellishment. As others have said, the included screws were too short, but we found the right ones easily.
customer_reviews.author: cblcar

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These shelf brackets are a great value. They have the cast iron look, without the cost of decorative cast iron brackets. And the look nicer than the equivalently priced Rubbermaid brackets. The only knock on this product is that installation is a bit tricky. The upper screw holes are exactly 1.5" apart, which is the width of a stud. In order to install these onto studs, you'll have to offset the bracket on the stud so that one of the upper screw holes, and the single bottom screw hole, align with the stud. The remaining upper screw hole will have to be secured via wall anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy! I am super happy with the purchase for the price. I am going to be mounting a narrow section of butcher block to the wall to use as a desk. I think they will be perfect. Will try to remember to add pictures once I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: these are beautifully made and very strong
customer_reviews.text: these are beautifully made and very strong. I liked the clean lines. I've put hefty chestnut boards on them - a good weight - and pottery on that - and I'm totally confident these aren't going anywhere. A little pricier than the local big box store, but worth it if being used in an area to show off something pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Betablues

customer_reviews.title: Natural Rust
customer_reviews.text: It took some looking around but I like these brackets. Two per order. Natural rust. Not painted. Very sturdy for a heavy duty shelf. Do not order for light duty. I didn’t fasten to studs. I fastened to solid wood. The opposing holes will make it difficult to hit a stud with both screws. The screws that came with them are junk. I didn’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but worth the handmade look
customer_reviews.text: These are well built brackets, not flimsy stamped garbage metal. They appear to be cast iron and have that handmade look. They are individually wrapped 2 per box. The boxes were in a little bit of rough shape when arrived but after inspection items are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and attracive
customer_reviews.text: These brackets are simple, strong, and much nicer looking than most brackets. We used them to support a overhanging granite counter-top. The style of these brackets improves knee clearance while sitting on stools at the counter. I did not use the screws that came with the brackets because I needed longer screws to reach under-laying studs for solid mounting. I am very satisfied with these brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Riley

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 excellent quality for great price- polished industrial loom
customer_reviews.text: This is strong enough to hold up a small quart slab, very impressed with the finish and look, the brass adds an 18th century industrial look to the kitchen. Will be buying another two sets for wooden floating shelves. Great buy 10/10
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelf brackets! I couldn’t find any premade shelves that I liked and that fit my space so I decided to make them. These brackets were exactly what I was looking for. Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: These were of high quality for a very reasonable price. Nice paint. Sturdy. Screws provided. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: OldDancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic on my open shelves! Very well made and super sturdy. Absolutely worth the price. Zero regrets. Contractor ended up using different screws but that is a minor issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship and beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the appearance and quality of workmanship of these brackets. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a stylish shelf bracket. I only wish they were available as singles as well as pairs since I had to purchase 2 pair when I only needed 3.
customer_reviews.author: P Stith

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and very strong.
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking, very strong brackets! However the spacing of the double screw holes is wider then a stud. I had to drill an additional hole between the two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Quality brackets.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and well-made. I haven't actually made the shelf yet, but I'll be using these with some reclaimed barn wood I have and putting in the bathroom. Overall, I'm very happy with the quality and it should go nicely with the industrial farmhouse theme in that bathroom. I'll update my review once the remodel is finished and the shelf is up. Appreciated that the screws were included.
customer_reviews.author: TSL3191

customer_reviews.title: I used it to support a giant 19" deep 16 ft wide wood shelf and it worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Very well made and strong as heck. I used it to support a giant 19" deep 16 ft wide wood shelf and it worked like a charm. The only problem is that for some reason they come with flat head screws. I didn't even know they still make those. They went right into the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tchochiev

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good price
customer_reviews.text: Up close these are not as "rustic" looking as I had hoped, i.e. wrought iron look, but they are the matte finish we wanted and a very simple design, for not a lot of money. We have not yet hung them but I'll try to remember to add photos once they are up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Hardware not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what we needed. Only drawback was the set of two screw holes were too far a part for one stud and the screws were too short. We used other screws. Should contain anchor for the screw that cannot lock into a stud
customer_reviews.author: AKA

customer_reviews.title: Theses brackets need longer screws
customer_reviews.text: I liked the brackets and so did the owner The only thing that caused us a bit of trouble were the length of the screws. An 1 1/4” is not long enuf to anchor the brackets securely to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: michaelmartin

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: like the look but they require new hardware and may not install properly to studs, wish I would have realized this earlier, too late to return now
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The brackets look great, and feel very well built
customer_reviews.text: The brackets look great, and feel very well built, like they'll last a long time. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because the screws that come with it are really soft and strip easily. You'll need to pre-drill a pilot hole if you're going into a really hard surface, or those screws will never make it all the way down. I also want to give a good review for the seller A29. There was an issue with my order, but they resolved the issue without much hassle at all. So, they deserve some good props for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brackets are not straight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered eight brackets and three of them are not straight at all. Not sure if this is how the product is been designed but when you see them all together it looks Like the shelves are not level
customer_reviews.author: Kwhite

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful, heavy and well made! Exactly what we were hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful heavy bracket. It worked for some open shelving we put up in our dining room. Absolutely stunning!!
customer_reviews.author: Peanut_22

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted/needed. Thanks for the fast and friendly service.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. Very sturdy and perfect for my project. Gave 3 stars on ease of install due to the provided screws. A Phillips screw would be easier to install vs the flathead.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We paired these up with some old reclaimed beam shelves, which aren't lightweight. They look gorgeous and feel very sturdy. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: The brackets are well-made and packaged to arrive in good shape. They will look good I'm sure
customer_reviews.text: The brackets are well-made and packaged to arrive in good shape. They will look good I'm sure. The mounting and assembly instructions, however, are not so helpful. Units are in metric only, pictures only, and essential measurements for mounting are absent.
customer_reviews.author: GBowman

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easy to install and exactly what I needed. Plan to use them for any other floating shelves I put up. The only additional thing I need is a set in white. :)

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These brackets are sturdy, well made and attractive. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great pick! We just renovated our kitchen over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pick! We just renovated our kitchen over the summer and wanted to create a coffee-like corner. The brackets are perfect for our design and practical for the weight..they also hold our recipe books. If you’re looking for a timeless look this is the way to go.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These look great holding up a reclaimed wood shelf. Look more expensive than they were.

customer_reviews.text: I like how heavy these are. I also liked that the screw holes came out of the bracket for an extra detail. I had to return them because of that detail. The space I had was too small. I wish it would have worked!

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly what I was looking for. The design and placement of the screw holes make them much more secure that in my old nyc apartment walls that previous brackets I have tried.

customer_reviews.text: They are extremely sturdy, the perfect size and look I wanted, and the price was truly unbeatable. I would highly recommend these and would definitely buy them again!

customer_reviews.title: These brackets are well made and look great. I wanted something a little different from plain ...

customer_reviews.text: Very Nice and sturdy Product. They fit very well in my office. The only comment I have is that I would have preferred if these were left oiled or natural in finish as opposed to being painted in black. I debated on stripping them, but decided against it.

customer_reviews.text: The shelves are good but the screw are terrible. Purchase new screw before you do the installation.

customer_reviews.text: The offset screw holes make it difficult to get centered on a stud. The screws provided are also a tad long for your common board thickness .

These were perfect, much less in cost than what my friend had ordered from another company and I honesty think they look the same.

customer_reviews.text: I really like how sturdy and beefy they are. I spray painted them with a satin bronze to match our cabinets hardware. I'm using them to support an overhang on our countertop.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy shelf brackets.
customer_reviews.text: We used 3 of these brackets to hold a shelf made of quartz, which is very heavy. The brackets are holding it steady, with no movement. And they are very nice looking. Overall a great buy!

customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of these to hold up 4 kitchen shelves. They're very sturdy and the simple design looks great! I LOVE that the screw holes are offset which makes them much easier to install having the hole be in the middle of the bar. For the price, these are perfect and I would highly recommend them.

product_meta.title: Shelf Brackets 9 7/8 x 7 3/8 Inches Heavy Duty Iron L Brackets with Black Powder Coat Finish for Shelves Corner Bracket for Wall Shelves DIY Kitchen Shelving Right Angle Braces, Set of 2
feature_bullets: VERSATILE ADJUSTABLE SPACING: These authentically designed shelf brackets are HANDCRAFTED in SOLID IRON and are ADJUSTABLE, so mounting them on either direction can be done which makes it easy for you to use according to your convenience. These Right Angle L Bracket can hold up to 6” or 8” deep shelves.

DIMENSIONS: The dimensions of the L Brackets are as follows; LENGHT: 7 3/8”, HEIGHT: 9 7/8”, WIDTH: 1 7/8”. Sold as a Set of 2. The pack includes screws as well which will help you secure the L Brackets safely.

UTILITY: These corner brackets can be used for decorating your home office or store shelves. Shelf braces can also be used for mounting cisterns, sinks, roof supports, columns, pillars. and frames giving an extra edge to your decor.

BLACK POWDER COATING FINISH: These Right Angle Brackets are BLACK POWDER COATED which is baked on finish. This is done to keep away rust & premature wearing, Keeping the shelves look pristine for as long as you need them also adds a natural shine to them.

STEPS TO INSTALL SHELF BRACKET: For fixing screws on any wooden surface, mark and drill pilot holes with a drill bit appropriate for the mounting hardware. Put a drop of oil on the screw tip,Insert and tighten the screw. Do not over torque the screw as it may break. If the bracket is being fixed on a hard surface, a wall anchor may be required. These are available at hardware stores.
